import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../css/Navbar.css' function Navbar({ name, gateway, createdAt, uploadScheme }) { console.log("qwdq") console.log(name) const [selectedFile, setselectedFile] = useState(null) const onChangeHandler = event => { setselectedFile(event.target.files[0]) } const onClickHandler = () => { uploadScheme(selectedFile) } return (
Информационная система: {name} IP-адрес сети: {gateway} Дата создания системы: {createdAt}
) } export default Navbar
